  • Method Details

    • isDateValid

      public static boolean isDateValid(int date)

      Method that checks if date is valid

      Ensure date follow DD/MM/YYYY format

      Minimum of 7 digits when date column is single digit, maximum of 8 digits

      Assume all months have 31 days

      Parameters:
      date - Date to check
      Returns:
      Boolean value indicating if a given date is valid or not

    • doDatesCollide

      public static boolean doDatesCollide(int[] dates, String userID, filehandler.Database database)
      Method that checks if the dates of a camp collides with the current camps that a student has registered for
      Parameters:
      dates - Dates of camp that is being checked
      userID - User identification of student that is being checked
      database - Database of Users
      Returns:
      Boolean value indicating if the dates collide or not

      public static boolean isDateSmaller(int date1, int date2)

      Parameters:
      date1 - First set of dates
      date2 - Second set of dates
      Returns:
      Boolean value indicating if date1 is earlier than date2
